member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether special indicator that says the mesh does not use parts at all. This is the case for some furniture/background models.

member.summary: The Raw shape index list. This is formatted as [Base Index To Replace] -> [New Vertex to point to].

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.ShapeData.AssignMeshAndLodNumbers(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Int32}})
member.summary:
Regenerates all the Mesh/Lod Numbers for the ShapeParts based on the index offsets and other information.
Kind of computationally expensive, so this is only done once and then cached in the shape parts themselves.

member.summary: The Name of the bone.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.SkeletonData.BoneNumber
member.summary: The bone number.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.SkeletonData.BoneParent
member.summary: The bone parent.
member.remarks: The base bone that has no parent will have a value of -1.

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.ModelModifiers
member.summary: List of modifier functions to TTModel Objects.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.ModelModifiers.AutoScaleModel(FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel,FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel,System.Double,System.Action{System.Boolean,System.String})
member.summary: Automatically rescales the model to correct for unit scaling errors based on comparison of size to the original model.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.ModelModifiers.MatrixTransform(SharpDX.Vector3,SharpDX.Matrix)
member.summary: This takes a standard Affine Transformation matrix [0,0,0,1 on bottom], and a vector, and applies the transformation to it. Treating the vector as a [1x4] Column, with [1] in the last entry. This function is necessary because SharpDX implementation of transforms assumes your affine matrices are set up with translation on the bottom(and vectors as rows), not the right(and vectors as columns).

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.ModelModifiers.Normalize(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Byte})
member.summary: Normalizes a byte array to sum to 255 (minus rounding errors)

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.ModelModifiers.MakeImportReady(FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel,System.Action{System.Boolean,System.String},System.Boolean)
member.summary:
This function does all the minor adjustments to a Model that makes it ready for injection into the SE filesystem. Such as flipping the UVs, calculating tangents, and applying the global level size multiplier. Likewise, MakeExportReady() undoes this process.
Weight check skip lets us avoid some calculation in cases where we already know they're fine.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.ModelModifiers.MakeExportReady(FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel,System.Action{System.Boolean,System.String})
member.summary: This process undoes all the strange minor adjustments to a model that FFXIV expects in the SE filesystem, such as flipping the UVs, and having tiny ass models.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.ModelModifiers.CalculateTangents(FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel,System.Action{System.Boolean,System.String},System.Boolean)
member.summary: Convenience function for calculating tangent data for a TTModel.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.ModelModifiers.CalculateTangentsFromBinormals(FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel,System.Action{System.Boolean,System.String})
member.summary: Calculates the tangent data, assuming we already have the binormal data available.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.ModelModifiers.ApplyShapes(FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel,System.Collections.Generic.List{System.String},System.Boolean,System.Action{System.Boolean,System.String})
member.summary: Applies a given set of shapes in order to the model. Starting clean will start from the original base model. Setting startClean to false will continue applying shapes to the current already shape-deformed model.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.ModelModifiers.NoOp(System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: /dev/null function used when no logging parameter is supplied, just to make sure we don't have to constantly null-check the logging functions.

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup
member.summary: Class representing a mesh group in TexTools At the FFXIV level, all the parts are crushed down together into one Singular 'Mesh'.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup.Material
member.summary: Material used by this Mesh Group.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup.Name
member.summary: Purely semantic.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup.Bones
member.summary: List of bones used by this mesh group's vertices.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup.SetIndexAt(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Set an index by its MESH RELEVANT index ID and vertex ID.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup.SetVertexAt(System.Int32,FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTVertex)
member.summary: Set a vertex by its MESH RELEVANT vertex id.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup.GetPartRelevantVertexInformation(System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves all the part information for a given Mesh-Relevant vertex Id.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup.GetOwningPartIdByIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the part id of the part which owns a given triangle index.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup.GetOwningPartIdByVertex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the part id of the part which owns a given vertex.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup.GetVertexAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Accessor for the full unified MeshGroup level Vertex list.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup.GetIndexAt(System.Int32)
member.summary: Accessor for the full unified MeshGroup level Index list Also corrects the resultant Index to point to the MeshGroup level Vertex list.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup.UpdateShapeData
member.summary: Updates all shapes in this mesh group to any updated UV/Normal/etc. data from the base model.

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup.PartIndexOffsets
member.summary: When stacked together, this is the list of points which the Triangle Index pointer would start for each part.

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshGroup.PartVertexOffsets
member.summary: When stacked together, this is the list of points which the Vertex pointer would start for each part.

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshPart
member.summary: Class representing the base infromation for a Mesh Part, unrelated to the Item or anything else above the level of the base 3D model.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTMeshPart.UpdateShapeData
member.summary: Updates all shapes in this part to any updated UV/Normal/etc. data from the base model.

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel
member.summary: Class representing the base information for a 3D Model, unrelated to the item or anything else that it's associated with. This should be writeable into the FFXIV file system with some calculation, but is primarly a class for I/O with importers/exporters, and should not contain information like padding bytes or unknown bytes unless this is data the end user can manipulate to some effect.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.Source
member.summary: The internal or external file path where this TTModel originated from.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.MeshGroups
member.summary: The Mesh groups and parts of this mesh.

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.XivRace
member.summary: Enum containing all known races
member.remarks: Some of the NPC races don't seem to be present anywhere They were added to the list in case they are ever used in the future

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.IsInternal
member.summary: Is this TTModel populated from an internal file, or external?

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.Bones
member.summary: Readonly list of bones that are used in this model.

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.Materials
member.summary: Readonly list of Materials used in this model.

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.Attributes
member.summary: Readonly list of attributes used by this model.

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.HasShapeData
member.summary: Whether or not to write Shape data to the resulting MDL.

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.ShapeNames
member.summary: List of all shape names used in the model.

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.ShapePartCount
member.summary: Total # of Shape Parts

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.ShapeDataCount
member.summary: Total Shape Data (Index) Entries

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.ShapePartCounts
member.summary: Per-Shape sum of parts; matches up by index to ShapeNames.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.GetRawShapeParts
member.summary: Gets all the raw shape data of the mesh for use with importing the data back into FFXIV's file system. Calling/building this data is somewhat expensive, and should only be done if actually needed in this specified format.

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.HasWeights
member.summary: Whether or not this Model actually has animation/weight data.

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.VertexCount
member.summary: Sum count of Vertices in this model.

member.name: P:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.IndexCount
member.summary: Sum count of Indices in this model.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.GetBoneSet(System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates a bone set from the model and group information.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.ReplaceBytesAt(System.Collections.Generic.List{System.Byte},System.Byte[],System.Int32)
member.summary: Replaces the bytes in a given byte array with the bytes from another array, starting at the given index of the original array.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.GetMaterialIndex(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the material index for a given group, based on model and group information.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.GetAttributeBitmask(System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the bitmask value for a part's attributes, based on part and model settings.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.UpdateShapeData
member.summary: Updates all shapes in this model to any updated UV/Normal/etc. data from the base model.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.SanityCheck(FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel,System.Action{System.Boolean,System.String})
member.summary: Performs a basic sanity check on an incoming TTModel Returns true if there were no errors or errors that were resolvable. Returns false if the model was deemed insane.

member.name: M:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel.CheckCommonUserErrors(FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModel,System.Action{System.Boolean,System.String})
member.summary: Checks the model for common valid-but-unusual states that users often end up in by accident, providing a warning message for each one, if the conditions are met.

member.summary: Creates a list from the data entries in a cache table, using the given where clause and predicate.

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModelDb.WhereClause
member.summary: Class for composing SQL Where clauses programatically. A [WhereClause] with any [Inner] entries is considered a parenthetical group and has its own Column/Value/Comparer ignored.

member.summary: Generates the body of the Where clause, without the starting ' where '.
member.param: If literal word ' where ' should be included.

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTModelDb.CacheReader
member.summary: A thin wrapper for the SQLiteDataReader class that helps with string column accessors, NULL value coalescence, and ensures the underlying reader is properly closed and destroyed to help avoid lingering file handles.

member.summary: Gets returns ther raw SQLiteDataReader object.

member.summary: Gets column names/keys.

member.summary: Moves forward to the next row.

member.summary: Creates and populates a TTModel object from a raw XivMdl.

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTShapePart
member.summary: Class representing a shape data part. A MeshGroup may have any amount of these, including multiple that have the same shape name.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTShapePart.Name
member.summary: The raw shp_ identifier.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTShapePart.Vertices
member.summary: The list of vertices this Shape introduces.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTShapePart.VertexReplacements
member.summary: Dictionary of [Part Level Vertex #] => [Shape Part Level Vertex #] to replace it with.

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.TTVertex
member.summary: Class representing a fully qualified, Square-Enix style Vertex. In SE's system, these values are all keyed to the same index value, so none of them can be separated from the others without creating an entirely new vertex.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.UnknownData0.Unknown
member.summary: Gets or sets this data block is currently unknown.
member.remarks: The size of this unknown data block is [ MdlModelData.Unknown2 * 32 ].

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.UnknownData1.Unknown
member.summary: Gets or sets this data block is currently unknown.
member.remarks: The size of this unknown data block is [ MdlModelData.Unknown3 * 20 ].

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.UnknownData2.Unknown
member.summary: Gets or sets this data block is currently unknown.
member.remarks: The size of this unknown data block is [ MdlModelData.Unknown9 * 12 ].

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexData
member.summary: This class contains the properties for the Vertex Data.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexData.Positions
member.summary: The vertex position data in Vector3 format (X, Y, Z).

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexData.BoneWeights
member.summary: The bone weight array per vertex.
member.remarks: Each vertex can hold a maximum of 4 bone weights.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexData.BoneIndices
member.summary: The bone index array per vertex.
member.remarks: Each vertex can hold a maximum of 4 bone indices.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexData.Normals
member.summary: The vertex normal data in Vector4 format (X, Y, Z, W).
member.remarks: The W coordinate is present but has never been noticed to be anything other than 0.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexData.BiNormals
member.summary: The vertex BiNormal data in Vector3 format (X, Y, Z).

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexData.BiNormalHandedness
member.summary: The vertex BiNormal Handedness data in bytes.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexData.Tangents
member.summary: The vertex Tangent data in Vector3 format (X, Y, Z).

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexData.Colors
member.summary: The vertex color data in Byte4 format (R, G, B, A).

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexData.Colors4
member.summary: The vertex color data in Color4 format.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexData.TextureCoordinates0
member.summary: The primary texture coordinates for the mesh in Vector2 format (X, Y).

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexData.TextureCoordinates1
member.summary: The secondary texture coordinates for the mesh in Vector2 format (X, Y).

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexData.Indices
member.summary: The index data for the mesh.

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexDataStruct
member.summary: This class contains the properties for the Vertex Data Structures.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexDataStruct.DataBlock
member.summary: The vertex data block the data belongs to.
member.remarks: There are usually 2 data blocks and usually contain the following data Block 0: Positions, Blend Weights, Blend indices Block 1: Normal, Tangent, Color, Texture Coordinates.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexDataStruct.DataOffset
member.summary: The offset to the data within the Data Block.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexDataStruct.DataType
member.summary: The type of the data.

member.name: F:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexDataStruct.DataUsage
member.summary: What the data will be used for.

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexDataStruct.VertexDataType
member.summary: Enum containing the Data Type for data entries in the Vertex Data Blocks.

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.Models.VertexDataStruct.VertexUsageType
member.summary: Enum containing the what the data entries in the Vertex Data Block will be used for.

member.name: T:FfxivResourceConverter.Resources.BoneSet
member.summary: This class contains the properties of the Bone Index Data.
member.remarks: This references the specific bones that are used by the mesh by their index in the bone string list.

member.summary: The list of Bone Indices.

member.summary: The number of indices in the Bone Index Data.
